{{Disambiguation}}

'''Moss''' may refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==
* {{BlockLink|Moss Block}}, a solid green block
* {{BlockLink|Moss Carpet}}, a block crafted from moss blocks, similar to carpets
* {{BlockLink|Pale Moss Block}}, a pale gray block
* {{BlockLink|Pale Moss Carpet}}, a block crafted from pale moss blocks, similar to carpets
* {{BlockLink|Pale Hanging Moss}}, a pale gray hanging block
* {{BlockLink|Glow Lichen}}, a luminous vegetative block
* {{BlockLink|Vines}}, a growing vegetative block
* {{BlockLink|Mossy Cobblestone}}, a mossy variant of cobblestone
* {{BlockLink|Mossy Stone Bricks}}, a mossy variant of stone bricks
* {{EnvLink|Forest Rock}}, a terrain feature that generates in the old growth taiga biome
* [[File:Pale moss patch.png|32px]] [[Pale moss patch]], feature consisting of pale moss and other plants found in the [[pale garden]]
